About

Greenhouse Games, LLC is a game development company dedicated to making fun, simple, and addicting games. We build games for the web, iOS, and android using the latest technologies. We like to share our knowledge with our users by offering live examples to learn the intricacies of game developement.


Greenhouse Games, LLC is owned and operated by Brian Soumakian.
